Example:
--------
Root lexicon ``Tcl.root`` and text:

.. code-block:: tcl

   #! /bin/env tclsh
   # Tcl example from the tcl-lang wiki
   
   package require Tk
   button .b -text "Push Me" -command {tk_messageBox -message "hello, world"}
   pack .b
